description:
The kingdom is under attack by the dragons' army!

As the most skilled protector of the kingdom, you must strike back against the invaders with your mastered archery. With enemies appearing everywhere, how can you possibly defeat them with a single bow? No problem! The engineers have invented various types of traps. Use them wisely to mount defensive lines, and defeat the evil dragons!

Game Features:

- A pleasurable action shooting experience with new tower defence elements

- Use various types of traps and skills to strike back at enemies

- Two modes of difficulty
name: Come On! Dragons
